description: Sven Vollfied is a sweeper, who becomes Train`s partner after Train leaves Chronos. He later befriends Eve, being the first person to treat her like a human, which causes the two to become very close. He follows a strict code of chivalry; he is always respectful to women and children and acts very proper. He is often tortured by Train`s capricious personality and is usually dragged into trouble and even more debt because of it.
name: Sven Vollfield
